alert.note: Alert for Winona (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 4:03AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Winona County through 500 AM CDT... At 403 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Plainview to Chatfield. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Altura around 415 AM CDT. Stockton and Rollingstone around 420 AM CDT. Winona and Goodview around 425 AM CDT. Dakota around 445 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Whitewater State Park, Wyattville, Ridgeway, Whitman, Utica, New Hartford, Beaver and Minnesota City. This includes Interstate 90 in Minnesota between mile markers 233 and 276. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
